dialogue.htmlContent: Hallway through Helena's apartment. Occasional harpy maids stop to curtsy as you pass.
Balcony overlooking Dominion streets. Higher than buildings around, so still have privacy (apart from occasional harpy swooping around overhead).
Helena's bedroom is very large. King-sized bed and massive walk-in wardrobe.
Scarlett's bedroom is very large. King-sized bed and massive walk-in wardrobe.
Helena's study room has several large bookcases stacked full of expensive-looking tomes.
Kitchen is staffed by professional harpy chef.
Large dining table with a dozen chairs. Harpy maid is standing ready to serve.
Huge lounge with a dozen comfortable sofas positioned around the place.
Arcane-powered hot tub in one corner of the balcony.
